verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Put on the garment of praise For the spirit of heaviness Lift up your voice to God Praise with the Spirit And with understanding Oh, magnify the Lord!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All you that mourn in Zion, I have authority To appoint unto you in Zion Oil of joy that will set you free.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lift up the hands that hang down. Lift up the voice now still. Give unto God continuous praise Sing forth from Zionâ€™s hill.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sing to Yahweh Alleluia Worship and praise our God Praise and adore Him Bow down before Him Oh, magnify the Lord.{/lang-eng}
